plot outline: Nana is a taxi driver, who lives with his aunt. Mama, an extremely clumsy inspector who cannot catch a single criminal, lives with his uncle Hambir. In order to save his job, Mama must catch DD, a notorious don. One fateful day, Mama almost catches DD. Unfortunately, Nana, who happens to be nearby, accidentally helps DD run from the police, making Mama think that Nana is the real don. Meanwhile, grateful for the favor, DD has befriended Nana, almost forcing him to join his gang. The rest is a hilarious story of cops and robbers.
title: Nana Mama
plot: Nana, a taxi driver unknowingly helps DD, a notorious criminal. In order to return the favour, DD forces him to join his gang, but Mama, a smart police officer ruins his plan.

Nana is a taxi driver, who lives with his aunt. Mama is an extremely clumsy inspector who cannot catch a single criminal and lives with his uncle, Hambir. In order to save his job, Mama must catch DD, a notorious don. One fateful day, Mama almost catches DD; unfortunately, Nana, who happens to be nearby, accidentally helps DD run from the police. This makes Mama somehow think that Nana is the real don. Meanwhile, grateful for the favour, DD befriends Nana, almost forces him to join his gang. The rest is a hilarious story of cops and robbers.
